name: Promptless
headline: Automatic updates for your customer-facing docs
description:
Promptless automatically updates your customer-facing documentation, including tutorials, how-to guides, API specs, knowledge bases, support articles, and blog posts. This content is often one of the first points of contact between your product and its users. Clear, accurate, and up-to-date docs are critical, influencing buying decisions, reducing support overhead, and increasing LTV. 

Providers like Readme and Mintlify effectively host your docs, but keeping them updated remains a serious challenge. Working alongside your hosting provider, Promptless lets you configure triggers so that your docs get automatically updated upon new feature releases, developer support questions, or internal use-case discussions. 

Promptless integrates directly with your organization’s entire knowledge ecosystem – issue trackers, internal knowledge bases, support ticket systems, and more – leading to holistic doc updates without expensive coordination between product, engineering, and support teams. 

With Promptless, documentation becomes a strategic advantage for growth, not a bottleneck or a liability.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Frances Liu, Founder
founders.description: Frances is building Promptless, helping companies keep customer-facing content up-to-date. Prior to Promptless, Frances led product, ML/AI engineering, and LLM ops on petabyte scale at Cloudflare, OneSignal, and Graft. Yale undergrad. Stanford PhD drop-out. Has published LLM research.

founders.name: Prithvi Ramakrishnan, Founder
founders.description:
Prithvi co-founded Promptless.

Before Promptless, he served as VP of Product & Engineering at Bond, a fintech infrastructure startup acquired by NYSE:FIS in 2023. There he saw firsthand the effort required to maintain hundreds of tutorials and guides and the outsized business impact of world-class documentation.

Prithvi graduated from Stanford in 2015 (B.S. CS, AI track). He was also a 4-time International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO) participant, including as the youngest participant in 2008.

generated_description:
**Promptless: Revolutionizing Documentation for Tech Teams**

Founded in 2024 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W25, Promptless is carving out a niche in the tech landscape from its base in San Francisco. With only two passionate team members, the company is on a mission to ensure that customer-facing documentation—think how-to guides, tutorials, API specs, and support articles—stays up-to-date automatically. 

Documentation is often the first touchpoint between a product and its users; clear, accurate, and current docs can sway buying decisions, lighten the support load, and ultimately enhance a company’s long-term value. Companies like Readme and Mintlify have made strides in hosting docs, but the real challenge has been keeping them fresh as products evolve. This is where Promptless steps in.

Promptless supercharges documentation by integrating seamlessly with an organization's entire knowledge ecosystem—be it issue trackers like Jira, internal databases like Confluence, or ticket systems. By configuring triggers, anything from feature releases to developer inquiries can prompt an automatic documentation update. This holistic approach minimizes the costly back-and-forth often required between product, engineering, and support teams, transforming documentation from a bottleneck into a strategic asset.

Whether it's updating API references, keeping changelogs fresh, or ensuring the knowledge base reflects the latest product features, Promptless automates the mundane so that teams can focus on what truly matters. Plus, its AI capabilities help gather context across different tools, providing crucial insights that keep documentation relevant.

For those interested, Promptless is starting to make a wave in the developer tools space, leveraging generative AI, SaaS, and B2B principles. It’s the kind of leap that can simplify lives and make documentation an area of strength rather than a headache.

If you want to explore their platform more or have questions, check out [Promptless's website](https://gopromptless.ai/). It's time to let AI take the reins on document upkeep—your team and users will be grateful.
